intervention_catalogue.name: Greater Manchester - Education, training and employment (ETE)
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Education, training and employment services aim to help people on probation develop the skills they need for future employment. The services can be delivered across different formats, depending on the complexity of the individual’s needs.
long_description: Education, training and employment services aim to help people on probation develop the skills they need for future employment. The services can be delivered across different formats, depending on the complexity of the individual’s needs. These formats include:
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: The type, number and length of sessions can vary, depending on the location and service provider.

possible_outcomes: Education, training and employment services aim to achieve the following outcomes:
• finding and maintaining suitable training, education and employment, overcoming any potential barriers
• improving the skills and attitude needed to enable self-development and increase employability
